remarks: Right biconditional form of ~ e2 . ~ syl6ibr is ~ e2bir without virtual deductions.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 29-Apr-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
e2bir.1 $e |- (. ph ,. ps ->. ch ). $.
e2bir.2 $e |- ( th <-> ch ) $.
e2bir $p |- (. ph ,. ps ->. th ). $.
